items.title: Amazon.com, Inc. (AMZN): A Bull Case Theory
items.description: We came across a bullish thesis on Amazon.com, Inc. on Disruptive Analytics’ Substack by Magnus Ofstad. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on AMZN. Amazon.com, Inc.’s share was trading at $208.47 as of June 23rd. AMZN’s trailing and forward P/E were 33.95 and 32.26, respectively, according to Yahoo Finance. Amazon (AMZN) is a complex […]

items.title: Amazon Is Breaking The Bank With AWS Each Quarter (Rating Downgrade)
items.description: Amazon remains a top long-term pick, with AWS driving profitability and growth, despite recent market volatility and global trade risks. Read why AMZN is a Buy.
